models.name: Renata Piwkowski
models.subject: Studio experience
models.message: Fantastic experience. Staff sooooo friendly and courteous. The space is beautiful and bright, with natural light and clean. Would highly recommend.

models.name: Anith Mukherjee
models.subject: Great studio space
models.message: Staff were very friendly and helpful, and studio has excellent resources. Thanks!

models.name: Oscar Dewis
models.subject: Perfect Studio
models.message: Absolutely love this space, you can’t find anything Better (especially for the price) lyn the owner is so lovely and accommodating. Not to mention nicks extensive knowledge in rigging to make your lighting dreams to come to life. So great!!

models.name: Bonnie Hansen
models.subject: Best studio experience I’ve ever had
models.message:
Love the staff! The space!! And man the light is something else! 

Thank you for being amazing! That experience at studios is needed more :)

models.name: Felipe Villegas Múnera
models.subject: This studio is AMAZING!
models.message: This studio has everything that you need!!! Lights, softbox, umbrellas, backdrops, remotes, dressing rooms, cafeteria, the list goes on!! Lyn was so nice and helpful and made our life so much easier. Really appreciate it!

models.name: Bubblegum Newsletter
models.subject: Amazing Team and Studio!
models.message: We've worked with Lyn and team for years now. It has always been a breeze working with them. They are one of our families in business!

models.name: Anastasia Prodous
models.subject: Absolute love!
models.message: I really love this studio! Guys, you are the best!

models.name: Brooke James
models.subject: Fantastic Studio!
models.message: Just loved this space! Lyn and the team were so welcoming and accomodating to what we needed. The space was gorgeous and the equipment and amenities were incredible. We will definitely be back here!

models.name: Cass Scully of Bloom Mountains Designs
models.subject: Fantastic Studio Experience!
models.message: I was lucky enough to spend the day at Desk and Studio this week working on a branding shoot for my business. The space is beautiful and big. The lighting and background options were  fabulous. Nick and Anna were amazingly hospitable and helpful with our requests for assistance. The day was a brilliant success, I would definitely recommend to my friends, colleagues and family!

models.name: Chanel Wardini
models.subject: Amazing Space!
models.message: Was blown away with the customer service and shooting space. Lyn and the team accommodated to all of our needs for our product shoot and gave us access to all of their outstanding ammenities. Our content turned out perfect and we can't wait to shoot in this space again!
